fluentconf-native-web-apps-training.title: Native Web Apps Training
fluentconf-native-web-apps-training.description: A training at FluentConf 2015 on building a modern, well-structured application from scratch by combining best-of breed approaches and a carefully curated set of tools like React, ES2015, Webpack, Node, and Ampersand. We built an app.

jsla-ampersandjs-a-non-frameworky-framew.title: Ampersand.js: A Non-Frameworky Framework
jsla-ampersandjs-a-non-frameworky-framew.description: A talk at the js.la meetup about the Ampersand.js "framework".

triconf-the-10-most-important-things-ive.title: The 10 Most Important Things I've Learned, Ever
triconf-the-10-most-important-things-ive.description: A talk at TriConf 2014 about the most important things I've ever learned.

nodesummit-client-solutions-from-develop.title: Client Solutions from Development to Production
nodesummit-client-solutions-from-develop.description: A talk at NodeSummit 2013 about using Node for solutions in development and production environments.

triconf-passion-and-purpose.title: How To Get Your Dream Job in 5000 Words or Fewer and Live in the Woods and Work on The Internet
triconf-passion-and-purpose.description: A talk at TriConf 2013 about passion and purpose.

triconf-backbone-tips-and-tricks.title: Backbone: Tips & Tricks
triconf-backbone-tips-and-tricks.description: A talk at TriConf 2013 about Tips and Tricks in Backbone and ways to make it less cumbersome in web apps.

phx-tag-soup-html5-history.title: HTML5 History, You, and How to Keep Your Hair When Working With It
phx-tag-soup-html5-history.description: I gave this talk at Phx Tag Soup on October 27, 2011 about my recent experience with the HTML5 history API and possible pitfalls and solutions.

meltmedia-js-tips-and-best-practices.title: JS Tips and Best Practices
meltmedia-js-tips-and-best-practices.description: I gave this talk at a meltmedia monthly front-end meeting about our internal projects and how to structure JS modules for marketing sites.
